backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining product, industry, company info, and inquiry types with CRUD methods and in-memory maps plus blob storage mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration logic converting old actor state to the new structure with default companyInfo values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking fallback contact info feature to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all frontend components and configs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme variables for light and dark modes with industrial color system.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring providers and rendering all major site sections.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section fetching companyInfo and displaying history, mission, and capabilities with fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section providing inquiry form and showing company contact info with fallback address and phone.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing company info, social links, and quick navigation with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and scroll-based style changes using smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, marketing text, feature highlights, and buttons for contacting or viewing products.
frontend/src/components/Industries.tsx: Industries section fetching industry data via actor or falling back to defaults, displaying cards with images and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products section loading product data or defaults, organized into categories with images, specs, and tabbed browsing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state and login flow via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching products, industries, company info, inquiries, and submitting contact inquiries through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color palettes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing versions, existing features, and pending requests related to updating company address and phone number.
